name: Happy dog
description:
Happy Dog

~ A homage to the happiness of a city dog on its daily stroll ~

Welcome to the Copenhagen city park, where owners take their dogs for a walk, people enjoy nature and sunshine, and babies get their nap.

Assume the body and mind of a wiener dog and celebrate a beautiful day in the life of your cute doggy. The aim is to get excited!

Will you take control of your leash and pull your owner along for a change?

To do this, run into friendly squirrels and bouncing balls, all the while trying to control your increasingly excited self!

But watch out for the strollers in the park! You don't want to wake up the babies. Also, if you get too close to other owners in the park, they may catch you!

Wuf wuf and have fun!

Controls
A + D - move in the left or right direction
Space - jump run forward

Produced by
Game Engineer - William Skou Heidemann
Programming - Aleksander
Art, 3D Models, Textures, Animations, Grand Master - Owen Melisek
Art, 3D Models, Textures, Animations, Level Design - Silas Clusiau
Game menu maker and anarchist - Thorbjørn Rysgaard
Game Design/PM/tester - Kristoffer Hougaard

Special Thanks
Level One Jam
Norbu, wiener dog from Copenhagen
